asset.decimalsRangeError: Please enter a decimals number smaller or equal to 16.
asset.issuableLabel: (Please issue the asset within approx. __time__ mins.)

console.title: Console
console.message: Welcome to the Kusk Core API console.<1/> Type <2>help</2> for an overview of available commands
console.warningMessage: Scammers have been active, telling users to type commands here, stealing their wallet contents. Do not use this console without fully understanding the ramification of a command.
console.placeholder: Enter "help" for an overview of available commands

reset.title: Reset key password
reset.label: Reset the password
reset.newPWarning: Please enter at least 5 characters password.

key.tryPPlaceholder: Please entered the password that you need to check.

account.copyAddress: Copy this address to use in a transaction:
account.copyProgram: Copy this control program to use in a transaction:

new.quorumHint: Number of keys required for transfer

new.unsaveWarning: Your work is not saved! Are you sure you want to leave?

normal.feeDescription: This is the money that might be used to process this transaction. Your transaction will be mined usually within 2.5 minutes.
normal.chainTxNote: Chain Transactions will generate multiple transactions, cost an extra fee and improve UTXO amount limit in a single transaction.

advance.submitLabel: This transaction will be signed by the key and submitted to the blockchain.
advance.needMoreSignDescription: These actions will be signed by the Key and returned as a transaction JSON string, which should be used to sign transaction in a multi-sign spend.

generated.title: Generated Transaction
generated.lead: Use the following JSON string as the transaction to sign by another account:
generated.qrModalLabel: The following Qr Code represent the Json String. Please use the phone scanner to scan the Qr code.
generated.qrModalLabels: The Json is separated into __size__ different chunk of substring. Please use the phone scanner to scan the Qr code.

errorMessage.password: Your password is wrong, please check your password.
errorMessage.jsonError: To sign transaction must be a JSON string.
errorMessage.jsonObjectError: Contents must be represented as a JSON object

init.title: Init your account and key
init.restoreLabel: Click the button, and select the backup file
init.createDescription: This option will create a default account, key password and give you a option to keep you mnemonic.  Warning: key seed words will display only once, it's important to remember your password.

welcome.title: Configure Kusk Core
welcome.mainnetMsg: For common users to enter. Mainnet is the production network, that carry real Kusk transactions.
welcome.testnetMsg: For developers or kusk testers to enter. Testnet is an alternative Kusk blockchain, and to be used for testing.
welcome.solonetMsg: For users/developers to run and test wallet's new function. Solonet is a private sandbox blockchain network.

backup.title: Backup and Restore
backup.backupDescription: This option will back up all data stored in this core, including blockchain data, accounts, assets and balances.
backup.restoreKeystoreDescription: This option will restore the wallet data form a file. You might need to rescan your wallet, if you balance is not up to date.
backup.restoreMnemonicDescription: This option will restore the key related data by mnemonic. You might need to rescan your wallet, if you balance is not up to date.

mnemonic.backupMessage: Mnemonic used to restore the key related information. Please write down the following seed and save it in a secure location.
mnemonic.continue: I have written down the seed
mnemonic.confirmMessage: Confirm that you backed up your Mnemonic by filling the missing words.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.word: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

transaction: A transaction provides the amount of the asset either spend out from your account or come in to your account. In your transaction, the total amount of assets spent was equal to the total amount of assets controlled (received) plus the gas cost of transactions fee. SPEND Actions represent what comes in the transactions, while CONTROL Actions represent what comes out. Any combination of actions can be added to a single advanced transaction, as long as what goes in bigger than what comes out. Note that the differences of which become the amount of transactions fee.
key: Cryptographic private keys are the primary authorization mechanism on a blockchain. They control both the issuance and transfer of asset units. An asset or account will define one or more keys required for issuance or transfers.
account: An account is an object in Kusk that tracks ownership of assets on a blockchain by creating and tracking control programs. The account object does not exist on the blockchain - it is local to this Kusk. Only the control programs created in the account are visible on the blockchain.
asset: An asset is a type of value that can be issued on a blockchain. All units of an asset are fungible and can be transacted directly between parties without the involvement of the issuer.
balance: The balance shows the amount and the type of asset that a local Kusk account possess.
coreStatus: The core status shows the blockchain network status and the local setting.
accessControl: Access token is used for remote authorizations. An access token is required to connect a remote Kusk Core.
unspent: Each new transaction in the blockchain consumes some unspent outputs and creates others. An output is considered unspent when it has not yet been used as an input to a new transaction. All asset units on a blockchain exist in the unspent output set.
backupRestore: Backup and Restore the wallet information will be stored in a txt format. It’s important to keep your backup files in a safe place.

steps.title: Fill in the account "Alias" or "ID"
description: The account that you wished to spend from.

steps.title: Fill in the asset "Alias" or "ID"
description: The asset type that you wished to spend.

steps.title: Paste the "Address"
description: The address that you wish to send amount of asset to.

steps.title: Fill in the amount of the asset
Choose the gas
description: Choose the gas (tx. fees) that you want to spend for this transaction.

steps.title: Fill in the Key password
description: Fill in the key password when account created. Note：please use advanced transaction for multi-sign.

steps.title: Click the "Add action" button
description: Select "Spend from account" to add a new spend action.

steps.title: Click the "Add action" button
description: Select "Control with address" to add a new control action.

steps.title: Fill in the Key password
description: The key password when account created. Please use the "show advanced options" for multi-sign.

steps.title: Type name for account alias (ex. "alice")
description: An alias is a friendly label used to distinguish between accounts.

steps.title: Select "Use existing keys" or "Provide existing xpub" under "Keys and Signing"
description: Choose an existing key alias or enter an existing xpub.

steps.title: Enter an alias for your asset (ex. "gold")
description: An alias is a friendly label used to distinguish between assets.

steps.title: Select "Use existing a key" or "Provide existing xpub" under "Keys and Signing"
description: Choose an existing key alias or enter an existing xpub.

steps.title: Enter an alias for your key (ex. "goldkey")
description: An alias is a friendly label used to distinguish between keys.

steps.title: Enter and repeat the password for your key
description: It's important to memorize the password for your key and keep it somewhere safe. Kusk doesn't provide any lost and found.

steps.title: Enter the original password for your key
Enter and repeat the new password for your key
description: It's important to memorize the password for your key and keep it somewhere safe. Kusk doesn't provide any lost and found.

steps.title: Enter alias for the access token

message.CREATE_REGISTER_ACCOUNT: Default account and key have been initialized successfully.
message.CREATED_TOKEN_WITH_GRANT: Access token has been created successfully.

kuskError.KUSK103: A peer core is operating on a different blockchain network
kuskError.KUSK200: Quorum must be greater than 1 and less than or equal to the length of xpubs
kuskError.KUSK202: At least one xpub is required
kuskError.KUSK203: Root XPubs cannot contain the same key more than once
kuskError.KUSK701: Available funds of account are immature
kuskError.KUSK702: Available UTXOs of account have been reserved
kuskError.KUSK703: Not found UTXO with given hash
kuskError.KUSK707: One or more fields are missing
kuskError.KUSK746: Unbalanced asset amount between input and output
kuskError.KUSK748: Gas usage calculate got a math error
kuskError.KUSK770: Run limit exceeded because the KUSK Fee is insufficient
kuskError.KUSK774: Unsupported VM because the version of VM is mismatched
kuskError.KUSK802: Key not found or wrong password
kuskError.KUSK804: Could not decrypt key with given passphrase
kuskError.F_KUSK001: Unable to reset the key password.
kuskError.F_KUSK003: Your account has multiple keys, please use advanced transactions.
